root.message: The IMPUTATION field for indicator 4-1-2, translated into en
root.data:
Treatment of missing values:

  • At country level:

The completion rate can be calculated from older cohorts who are outside of the age bracket specified in the definition of the indicator to obtain estimates for different years. Gaps in national time series can also be imputed. using the aforementioned model-based to estimate the completion rate.

  • At regional and global levels:

See above.
